name: The Deaf Musician
description:
The Deaf Musician

Even though you are not able to hear music, you can feel music. It is hard to make money as a deaf musician, but a charming manager recognised your skills and gave you a chance. Will you be able to show the world your potential?

This little game was made for the Rhythm Game Jam 2021 in three days. Everything was created by me from scratch. I thought it would be an interesting and creative idea to create a Rhythm game without any sound.
